name: Questionable Time Dilation in an Alien Spacetimey World
name_original: Questionable Time Dilation in an Alien Spacetimey World
description:
A game about slowing time by moving quickly while dodging alien fighters and kamikazeing while swinging around with a grappling hook and maintaining your momentum.  

Music is Hall of the Mountain King (if you can actually recognize it in the game)
